thread.title: Intel Rolls Out HD Graphics Driver 20.19.15.4300 for Several NUC Devices
thread.title_full: Intel Rolls Out HD Graphics Driver 20.19.15.4300 for Several NUC Devices - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Intel Rolls Out HD Graphics Driver 20.19.15.4300 for Several NUC Devices
text: Intel has announced the availability of a new HD Graphics package, namely version 20.19.15.4300, which adds support for the 6th Generation Core CPUs with Iris Graphics 540 and 550, and resolves several issues. However, take into account that this new update is only compatible with the NUC board and kit models highlighted in the Release Notes. Also, these devices must be powered by one of Microsoft’s Windows 7 and 8.1 OS, or by the 64-bit variant of Windows 10 platform. M... »
